prompts: Create a cheerful grass-type Pokemon that resembles a sunflower and has a friendly demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in sunny environments and has vibrant yellow petals.
Show me a whimsical character that embodies the essence of spring with green leaves and a bright face.
Design a playful creature that loves to dance in the sunlight and has a cute, flower-like appearance.
Generate a small Pokemon that can be found in gardens, with a round face and leafy limbs.
Give me a friendly grass-type Pokemon that resembles a flower and is known for its sunny personality.
Make a character that is designed for sunny habitats and has a joyful expression.
